'''Whitney''' is a women divorcing her husband [[Kyle]], portrayed by [[Julia Campbell]].

Whitney briefly dated [[Ross Geller|Ross]] but then reunited with her husband [[Kyle]]. Part of the reason she and Ross split was because Whitney was "whiny" and had a need for attention and tried to use sex as a weapon on many occasions.
